bryns_notebook.naive_description: Bryn's personal notebook. It's sealed shut with a tiny padlock... Not that you were going to read it anyway.
bryns_notebook.hidden_description: Bryn's personal notebook. It's sealed shut with a tiny padlock... Not that you were going to read it anyway.

factory_access_permit.naive_description: A permit that grants you access to the Nimbus III Maintenance Facility.

bipolar_junction_transistor.naive_description: It looks like a mechanical part of sorts.
bipolar_junction_transistor.hidden_description: Beeker says this is required to build a special kind of gun. You should hold on to it.

willets_floppy_disc.naive_description: Contains schematics for the Greatwing, which we will need in order to stop Skycorps from taking over the island. Dr. Willet told me to bring it to someone named Spencer in Ashtown.
willets_floppy_disc.hidden_description: Contains schematics for the Greatwing. Spencer needs a track zero sensor and a fresh head motor to access its contents.

track_zero_sensor.naive_description: A small sensor that Spencer needs to repair his floppy disc drive. Without it, he can't access the Greatwing schematics.

head_motor.naive_description: A tiny motor that Spencer needs to access Doc Willet's floppy disc.

bryns_note.naive_description: A mysterious note you found on your bookshelf.
bryns_note.actual_description: A note that Bryn left for you before fleeing the Firstwind. It contains the clearance code you need to escape your holding cell.

firstwind_hangar_key.naive_description: A small iron key that grants you access to the Firstwind's hangar shafts.
firstwind_hangar_key.hidden_description: A small iron key that grants you access to the Firstwind's hangar shafts.

woodshine_warehouse_key.naive_description: Allows you to enter Woodshine's warehouse.

nimbus_iii_boiler_room_key.naive_description: Allows you to enter Nimbus III's boiler room.

laboratory_key.naive_description: Grants access to Firstwind's research lab.

bit_cell_key.naive_description: Looks like just an ordinary key. There's no reason not to hold on to it.
bit_cell_key.hidden_description: The key to Bit's prison cell. He said he owes you big time for freeing him...

four_of_diamonds.naive_description: An old playing card you found in Bit's prison cell on Firstwind. It's definitely completely worthless.
four_of_diamonds.hidden_description: An old playing card you found in Bit's prison cell on Firstwind. It's definitely completely worthless.

boiler_key.naive_description: A key of unknown use. Might as well keep it.
boiler_key.hidden_description: The key to Firstwind's boiler room.

radar_device.naive_description: A map system. It fits perfectly in the top slot of your pocket gizmo.
radar_device.actual_description: A map system. It fits perfectly in the top slot of your pocket gizmo.

clock.naive_description: A clock that reads the current time of day. It was designed to fit snugly into your pocket gizmo.
clock.actual_description: A clock that reads the current time of day. It was designed to fit snugly into your pocket gizmo.

dog_leash.naive_description: You can use this to transport dogs.

ashtown_raspberry_preserves.naive_description: A delicious raspberry treat. It would taste better on some toast, but it will still restore your health if you eat it.

boxing_glove.naive_description: Seems like it could be useful to someone who is not you.

clamp.naive_description: A painted metal clamp. It could be useful for home improvements.

heart_keychain.naive_description: A heart keychain. You attach it to your belt and it gives you extra life.

stationary_rat.naive_description: You discovered this rat inside a chest. It obviously didn't want to be found.
stationary_rat.hidden_description: A very good boy who cannot spin.

loops_mixtape.naive_description: A mixtape with your brother's handwriting on the label. Your heart fills with sadness and rage when you look at it.
loops_mixtape.hidden_description: A mixtape that Loop hid in the woods when you were younger. You can play it on a jukebox.

red_jeans.actual_description: A pair of red jeans. If you wear them, you will appear fashionable.

clay_statue.naive_description: A common artifact of the ancient peoples.

glass_statue.naive_description: An uncommon artifact of the ancient peoples.

bronze_statue.naive_description: A rare artifact of the ancient peoples.

cinnabar_statue.naive_description: A very rare artifact of the ancient peoples.

jade_statue.naive_description: An incredibly rare artifact of the ancient peoples.

alabaster_statue.naive_description: A legendary artifact of the ancient peoples.

gas_mask.naive_description: You need this to navigate the Toxic Cavern without dying.

chalcedony_tee.naive_description: An elegant tee with a rhenite pendant.

skycorps_tee.naive_description: A t-shirt that Bryn let you borrow.

navy_top.naive_description: A traditional Kariba garment with a gold trim.

skycorps_shorts.naive_description: A pair of dark green shorts.

green_pants.naive_description: Your favorite pair of pants from back home.

punk_hair_dye.naive_description: A whacky and rebellious hair color.

punk_shirt.naive_description: A shirt that awakens your rebellious spirit.

punk_pants.naive_description: Black pants with a rebellious chain accessory.

hairtie.naive_description: Wear this to keep your hair from going all over the place all the time.

pioneer_medal.naive_description: A heavy medal crafted from old pioneer scrap metal. It grants you the ability to slide on the ground.
pioneer_medal.actual_description: A heavy medal crafted from old pioneer scrap metal. It grants you the ability to slide on the ground.

woodshine_totem.naive_description: An old stone totem that your mother gave you on your sixteenth birthday. It grants you the ability to roll when you land on the ground.
woodshine_totem.actual_description: An old stone totem that your mother gave you on your sixteenth birthday. It grants you the ability to roll when you land on the ground.

kariba_talisman.naive_description: An ancient talisman that hums with an ominous energy. It grants you the ability to slide on and jump off of walls.
kariba_talisman.actual_description: An ancient talisman that hums with an ominous energy. It grants you the ability to slide on and jump off of walls.

pirag_charm.naive_description: A mysterious charm of unknown origin. It doesn't seem to do anything.
pirag_charm.actual_description: A mysterious charm of unknown origin. It allows you to see the life force of your enemies.

old_ivory_amulet.naive_description: A powerful amulet covered in a layer of verdigris. It allows you to dash forward in the air.
old_ivory_amulet.actual_description: A powerful amulet covered in a layer of verdigris. It allows you to dash forward in the air.

sky_pendant.naive_description: A light pendant that you can wear around your neck. It allows you to jump a second time while in the air.
sky_pendant.actual_description: A light pendant that you can wear around your neck. It allows you to jump a second time while in the air.

forest_token.naive_description: A small iron token that you found in the abandoned forest. It allows you to kick and stun certain enemies after dashing.
forest_token.actual_description: A small iron token that you found in the abandoned forest. It allows you to kick and stun certain enemies after dashing.

imbier_totem.naive_description: A sinister totem from the depths of Imbier Temple. It allows you to dash a second time while in the air.
imbier_totem.actual_description: A sinister totem from the depths of Imbier Temple. It allows you to dash a second time while in the air.

ancient_periapt.naive_description: A golden charm that is always warm to the touch. It allows you to dash in any direction.
ancient_periapt.actual_description: A golden charm that is always warm to the touch. It allows you to dash in any direction.
